directions: Stir the gelatin into the boiling water until dissolved.  Pour in the ice water and vodka; mix well.  Pour into shot glasses or devices specifically made for 'Party Shots.'  Chill in the refrigerator for 1 to 2 hours, until set.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package raspberry flavored Jell-O® mix
title: Raspberry Party Shots
